overview: This release captures Queen live in Tokyo on 3th November 1982. Released in Japan only and recorded during the Hot Space tour.  Flash's Theme / The Hero Now I'm Here Put Out The Fire Dragon Attack Love of My Life Save Me Guitar Solo Under Pressure Crazy Little Thing Called Love Bohemian Rhapsody Tie Your Mother Down Teo Torriatte We Will Rock You We Are The Champions God Save the Queen
title: Queen: Live in Japan 1982
